page.title: 19A TYPICAL DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: At 7.30 I get up and have a wash using freezing cold water (to wake me up). I read the paper until 7.50 then I shout my brothers. I have Cornflakes and tea for breakfast. At 8.30 I walk slowly to school. At 8.50 we go into tutor group with our form tutor. Our first lessons are usually French or Welsh then we have a break before going into science. We have a 50 minute lunch break before music and R.E., then we have history. After tea a lot of children go to the playing fields to play rounders. Rounders is a game where there are four posts in a square and a person throws the ball at you and you try to hit it. Everytime you get round all the posts before the ball is back with the bowler you score a rounder. {(Education) (Recreation)}
